SELECT /* com.at.apcss.fm.fclt.mapper.FcltGdsMchnInfoMapper.selectFcltGdsMchnInfoList */ OTI.CRTR_YR , OTI.APC_CD ,(SELECT APC_NM FROM TB_APC_INFO WHERE APC_CD = OTI.APC_CD) AS APC_NM , OTI.ITEM_CD , OTI.ITEM_NM , OTI.SN
, FSD.SORT_MCHN_SPCFCT , FSD.SORT_BRCK_MCHN , FSD.COLOR_SORT , FSD.INR_DMG_IDNTF , FSD.SORT_MCHN_ETC , FSD.SHAP_SORT , FSD.MNFC_MCHN , FSD.PCKG_MCHN_GNRL , FSD.PCKG_MCHN_ATMTC , FSD.TOT_FRSH_CNV_MCHN , FSD.RBT_PLTZ , FSD.ETC_MNFC_MCHN_PRCS , FSD.ETC_MCHN , FSD.RMRK , FSD.MKR_NM , FSD.SORT_MCHN_HOLD_YN FROM TB_TE_APC_OPER_TRMT_ITEM OTI ,TB_TE_APC_FCLT_STTS_DTL FSD WHERE 1=1 AND OTI.APC_CD = FSD.APC_CD(+) AND OTI.CRTR_YR = FSD.CRTR_YR(+) AND OTI.SN = FSD.SN(+) AND OTI.OGNZ_SE_CD = '2' AND OTI.APC_CD IS NOT NULL
AND OTI.CRTR_YR = #{crtrYr}
AND OTI.APC_CD IN (SELECT APC_CD FROM TB_APC_INFO WHERE 1=1
AND CTPV = (SELECT CTPV FROM TB_COM_USER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId})
AND SGG = (SELECT SGG FROM TB_COM_USER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId})
)
ORDER BY OTI.CRTR_YR , APC_NM , OTI.SN
